subject: Patch in Paris
header: I am not sure what happened, but this week we are full on both web-related and database related articles. There is also this French hackathon we missed earlier, but it is less than 3 weeks from now. So if you don't know how to spend your vacation time, I can recommend visiting Paris and sitting in a dark room with a lot of other Perl hackers.
Or maybe using that as an excuse to visit Paris.
Oh and let me thank Dean Hamstead who recommended the Perl Weekly for the Syndey.pm members. He brought in 20 new, and hopefully happy, subscribers.
